quoteFirst: "He called the lawyer on the telephone at twenty minutes past two and said he would go at once to his office. If he had done so, he would have arrived there at
quoteLast: . He reached there, in fact, at two-fifty, ten minutes of three. A half-hour of his time isn't accounted for. He left the hotel at two-twenty-one.
title: The Winning Clue
author: Hay, James, 1881-1936

quoteLast: sad matrimonial experiences she was married by political arrangement to Alfonso, the son of Ercole, Duke of Ferrara. Before that marriage careful investigation as to her character was made and a special envoy sent for that purpose wrote that "there was nothing at all out of the way with Lucretia herself.
title: The century of Columbus
author: Walsh, James J. (James Joseph), 1865-1942
